title: Agneta Baumann - Comes love 1999

Hon ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤r den enda svenska artist som medverkar pÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¥ den internationellt producerade CD-serien Blue Voices tre volymer: The Finest In Jazz Ballad. 1997 mottog Agneta Baumann ett stipendium frÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¥n Laila and Charles Gavatin's Foundation for Jazz Music.
(wikipedia)

- - -

In this CD we are presented with a collection of American standards interpreted by a singer who is a firm believer in the charm (and importance) of the lyric. Agneta Baumann chooses to sing only those songs with which she has developed an emotional affinity and a genuinely deep feeling for the words as well as the music. With a little sense of imagination and adventure on the part of the listener one can embark on a sequence of events via the song titles and the contents of their lyrics. Comes love, nothing can be done. Exactly. That is what this aspect of life seems to be all about. - Her co-musicians are Bosse Broberg (trp), GÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶sta Rundqvist (p), Hans Backenroth (b), Johan LÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶fcrantz (dr). Recorded in June, 1999 in Stockholm. (naxosdirect.se)

- - -

Agneta Baumann - Comes love 1999
(Stockholm Touche Music)

 8. Who cares. 
 9. I have the feeling I've been here before. 
10. Get out of town. 
11. There's no you. 
12. It never entered my mind. 
13. In love in vain. 
14. What's new
